headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Save Los Santos from Certain Annihilation in The Doomsday Scenario for Double Rewards
content:
Heist Month continues apace this week, as GTA Online players go to outrageous depths and heights to prevent Avon Hertz from causing a case of mutually assured destruction.

Save Los Santos from certain annihilation at the hands of the eccentric billionaire by completing The Doomsday Scenario Finale and youâ€™ll earn 2X GTA$ and RP in return, all this week.
